name: Elon's last chance
description:
Elon found himself in an unusual situation again. Finding himself completely alone on the orbital station, he is forced to fight for his life by maintaining his life support systems in working order. Tasks pour on his head one after another. Irrigate the plants, charge the capsule, create components, and so on. There is almost no time for respite. And many tasks consist of subtasks.

Elon's last chance is a time management simulator with a running astronaut under your control. Complete tasks that appear gradually within the timer. Try to hold out as long as possible, because if any of the timers expires, the game will be over.

Game Features:
- Low-Poly visual style
- Musical accompaniment
- Marsian theme
